cards.title: Vitamin C Changes Skin Structure
cards.content: Dietary vitamin C travels through blood directly into skin layers, increasing thickness (more collagen) and enhancing cell renewal. Eating 2 kiwifruit daily (~250mg) for 8 weeks showed measurable improvements.
cards.takeaway: Eat vitamin C from fruits & veggies rather than just applying creams.

cards.title: Not All Plant Diets Equal
cards.content: Study of 63,835 adults over 9 years: minimally processed plant foods cut heart risk ~40%, but ultra-processed plant foods (chips, sugary cereals) increased risk ~40%.
cards.takeaway: Choose whole foods (beans, lentils, nuts) over processed veggie alternatives.
